meanings.definition: One million pixels, used as a measure of the resolution of a digital camera.
meanings.sent1: The new camera boasts a high number of megapixels for clear photos.
meanings.sent2: The smartphone camera has 12 megapixels, capturing detailed images.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally zoomed in too much, and now the picture is just a blur of megapixels.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like megapixels, capturing every detail of the scene before her.
meanings.sent5: The billboard displayed a stunning image with vivid colors thanks to its high megapixels.
